QuestData.Title: Fury of the Storm
QuestData.Description:
The Felskorn who ravage my brood were once Drekirjar - a tribe with whom we shared an ancient pact. Now, under the influence of the God-King, they forsake their oaths and strike at the forebears of their coveted drakes.
They should answer for this slight.
Awaken your fury, $c, and take the battle to them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Felskorn vrykul in Thorim's Peak.
QuestData.RewardText: The Felskorn have witnessed true strength today. $B$BThey will think twice before raising their blades to you again.
